main.welcome: 欢迎使用 Nginx Proxy Manager

all-hosts.no-ssl: 这个主机不会使用 HTTPS
all-hosts.advanced-warning: 自行承担在此处输入Nginx配置的风险！
all-hosts.advanced-config-var-headline: These proxy details are available as nginx variables:
all-hosts.advanced-config-header-info: 请注意, that any add_header or set_header directives added here will not be used by nginx. You will have to add a custom location '/' and add the header in the custom config there.

ssl.letsencrypt-agree: 我同意 Let's Encrypt Terms of Service
ssl.delete-ssl: The SSL certificates attached will NOT be removed, they will need to be removed manually.
ssl.hosts-warning: These domains must be already configured to point to this installation
ssl.no-wildcard-without-dns: Cannot request Let's Encrypt Certificate for wildcard domains when not using DNS challenge
ssl.certbot-warning: This section requires some knowledge about Certbot and its DNS plugins. Please consult the respective plugins documentation.
ssl.credentials-file-content-info: This plugin requires a configuration file containing an API token or other credentials to your provider
ssl.stored-as-plaintext-info: This data will be stored as plaintext in the database and in a file!
ssl.propagation-seconds-info: Leave empty to use the plugins default value. Number of seconds to wait for DNS propagation.
ssl.processing-info: Processing... This might take a few minutes.
ssl.passphrase-protection-support-info: Key files protected with a passphrase are not supported.

proxy-hosts.title: 代理主机
proxy-hosts.form-title: {id, select, undefined{New} other{Edit}} 代理主机
proxy-hosts.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the Proxy host for: {domains}?
proxy-hosts.help-content:
A Proxy Host is the incoming endpoint for a web service that you want to forward.
It provides optional SSL termination for your service that might not have SSL support built in.
Proxy Hosts are the most common use for the Nginx Proxy Manager.
proxy-hosts.custom-forward-host-help:
Add a path for sub-folder forwarding.
Example: 203.0.113.25/path/

redirection-hosts.title: 重定向主机
redirection-hosts.form-title: {id, select, undefined{New} other{Edit}} 重定向主机
redirection-hosts.delete-confirm: 确定要删除重定向主机: {domains}?
redirection-hosts.help-content:
A Redirection Host will redirect requests from the incoming domain and push the viewer to another domain.
The most common reason to use this type of host is when your website changes domains but you still have search engine or referrer links pointing to the old domain.

dead-hosts.title: 404 Hosts
dead-hosts.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this 404 Host?
dead-hosts.help-content:
A 404 Host is simply a host setup that shows a 404 page.
This can be useful when your domain is listed in search engines and you want to provide a nicer error page or specifically to tell the search indexers that the domain pages no longer exist.
Another benefit of having this host is to track the logs for hits to it and view the referrers.

streams.title: Streams
streams.forward-type-error: At least one type of protocol must be enabled
streams.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Stream?
streams.help-content:
A relatively new feature for Nginx, a Stream will serve to forward TCP/UDP traffic directly to another computer on the network.
If you're running game servers, FTP or SSH servers this can come in handy.

certificates.title: SSL Certificates
certificates.form-title: Add {provider, select, letsencrypt{Let's Encrypt} other{Custom}} Certificate
certificates.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this SSL Certificate? Any hosts using it will need to be updated later.
certificates.help-content:
SSL certificates (correctly known as TLS Certificates) are a form of encryption key which allows your site to be encrypted for the end user.
NPM uses a service called Let's Encrypt to issue SSL certificates for free.
If you have any sort of personal information, passwords, or sensitive data behind NPM, it's probably a good idea to use a certificate.
NPM also supports DNS authentication for if you're not running your site facing the internet, or if you just want a wildcard certificate.
certificates.reachability-info: Test whether the domains are reachable from the public internet using Site24x7. This is not necessary when using the DNS Challenge.
certificates.reachability-failed-to-reach-api: Communication with the API failed, is NPM running correctly?
certificates.reachability-failed-to-check: Failed to check the reachability due to a communication error with site24x7.com.
certificates.reachability-ok: Your server is reachable and creating certificates should be possible.
certificates.reachability-404: There is a server found at this domain but it does not seem to be Nginx Proxy Manager. Please make sure your domain points to the IP where your NPM instance is running.
certificates.reachability-not-resolved: There is no server available at this domain. Please make sure your domain exists and points to the IP where your NPM instance is running and if necessary port 80 is forwarded in your router.
certificates.reachability-wrong-data: There is a server found at this domain but it returned an unexpected data. Is it the NPM server? Please make sure your domain points to the IP where your NPM instance is running.
certificates.reachability-other: There is a server found at this domain but it returned an unexpected status code {code}. Is it the NPM server? Please make sure your domain points to the IP where your NPM instance is running.

access-lists.title: 访问列表
access-lists.form-title: {id, select, undefined{New} other{Edit}} 访问列表
access-lists.delete-confirm: 确定要删除这个访问列表吗?
access-lists.help-content:
Access Lists provide a blacklist or whitelist of specific client IP addresses along with authentication for the Proxy Hosts via Basic HTTP Authentication.
You can configure multiple client rules, usernames and passwords for a single Access List and then apply that to a Proxy Host.
This is most useful for forwarded web services that do not have authentication mechanisms built in or that you want to protect from access by unknown clients.
access-lists.delete-has-hosts: This Access List is associated with {count} Proxy Hosts. They will become publicly available upon deletion.
